Rows.Name: DatabaseReloadRequired
Rows.FlagDescriptor: Set as a needed flag when the event requires database presence

Rows.Name: DatabaseReloadCompleted
Rows.FlagDescriptor: Database has finished loading and DatabaseReloadComplete has be broadcast

Rows.Name: ActorsPreparedForBeginPlay
Rows.FlagDescriptor: Set when all actors are ready to have IcarusBeginPlay called

Rows.Name: GameModeHasBegunPlay
Rows.FlagDescriptor: The Game Mode has Begun Play!

Rows.Name: ProspectInfoFetched
Rows.FlagDescriptor: The Prospect info has been fetched from the backend

Rows.Name: WorldStatsSet
Rows.FlagDescriptor: The World Stats Have Been Set

Rows.Name: BuildingsFinishedLoading
Rows.FlagDescriptor: Represents all required grid_base operations have finished

Rows.Name: GameModeBuildingCheckComplete
Rows.FlagDescriptor: Check in game mode for no queued building processing occurring passed

Rows.Name: LocalPlayerInitialized
Rows.FlagDescriptor: Set when the Local Player has been created

Rows.Name: PlayerTrackerInitialized
Rows.FlagDescriptor: Set when the Player Tracker subsytem has finished initializing

Rows.Name: MapSubsystemInitialized
Rows.FlagDescriptor: Set when the Map Subsystem has finished initializing
